data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=tIltlkgR3f4Q7kNvgGy8dEB&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCBOL7QSBeOL1W6Xew6Fh-9a7QH7vmK7IPZGQ1B5aBfUw&oe=6683C04C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=D2OnirbiseIQ7kNvgFxLpEl&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCDC7JtMLs5LcbZr6QzSnehRoiuv85FyBIAwVx5vcODpA&oe=6683F69F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=u_MdO6xHgOMQ7kNvgF0EGrF&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC8OlIESd4bW54ZcENgHiouE_K_AUXbTk7HPE_eWd9RNA&oe=6683DBF1)
